title: Queued as secondary support, got put in a match within half a second
body: I kinda get the feeling it didn't even TRY to find me a game to play top in TBH

replies.body: for support mains, it's pretty awesome. Super fast Q's
Put top as your primary and mid as your secondary or if you are queing with someone make your secondary whatever their primary is.
when you are a main, and have support as a secondary option, you become a support main.
